Biden met with Navalny's wife, daughter on Thursday - White HouseU.S. President Joe Biden on Thursday met the wife and daughter of Alexei Navalny, the Russian opposition leader who died last week, "to express his heartfelt condolences", the White House said. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 19:44:25 GMT TCC6K3PZB5NP7LKTY4D4PNDPCE https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-meet-navalnys-wife-daughter-thursday-nbc-reports-2024-02-22/Reuters世界
US warned Russia over space weapons, US official saysThe United States has directly warned Russia against launching a new nuclear armed anti-satellite weapon, a U.S. official said on Thursday, speaking on condition of anonymity. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 19:31:50 GMT 2JZGCJJ3OBKE3N7JSNRX科泰姆https://www.reuters.com/world/us-warned-Russia-over-space-weapons-us-official-says-2024-02-22/Reuters世界
Blinken rallies support for Haiti security mission in BrazilCanada, Benin, France and Jamaica have offered support to a U.N.-backed international security force aimed at tackling rampant gang violence in Haiti, according to a statement from the United States, which co-hosted a meeting on the mission with Brazil. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 19:30:19 GMT 5RPWMDLRZBMDLB3MDQZX7ONOQM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/blinken-rallies-support-haiti-security-mission-brazil-2024-02-22/Simon Lewis世界美洲
Israel raids Nasser hospital again, Gaza ministry saysIsraeli forces raided Nasser Medical Complex, the biggest functioning hospital in Gaza, on Thursday shortly after withdrawing from it, the Palestinian enclave's health ministry said. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 19:25:38 GMT KSBOZ3PZLNIKXFGTDMLPTJTFFI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-raids-nasser-hospital-again-gaza-ministry-says-2024-02-22/Reuters世界中东
EU's new Anti-Money Laundering Authority to be based in FrankfurtThe European Union's new Anti-Money Laundering Authority (AMLA) will be based in Frankfurt, Germany, the Belgian Presidency of the EU said on Thursday, in a move the bloc hopes will advance its fight against illicit finance. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 19:02:56 GMT 4RLQ4XFNOJOGXNGLOSYFXQO5BY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-says-new-anti-money-laundering-authority-be-based-frankfurt-2024-02-22/Reuters世界欧洲
Spanish firefighters battle blaze engulfing apartment building in ValenciaFirefighters battled a blaze that engulfed an entire apartment building in the Spanish city of Valencia on Thursday, with local media reporting several residents still trapped inside. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 18:47:24 GMT SKKI7W3OSRIHNJJ6PNCDUMAQPI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spanish-firefighters-battle-blaze-engulfing-apartment-building-valencia-2024-02-22/Reuters世界欧洲
Pakistan to seek at least $6 bln in new IMF loan program, Bloomberg reportsPakistan plans to seek a new loan of at least $6 billion from the International Monetary Fund to help the incoming government repay billions in debt due this year, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing a Pakistani official. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 18:29:38 GMT V6ZET5QXNJJKZMHIRQRBOH76NI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-seek-least-6-bln-new-imf-loan-program-bloomberg-reports-2024-02-22/Reuters世界亚太地区
Chemical weapons watchdog blames Islamic State for 2015 Syria attackThe Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons (OPCW) on Thursday identified Islamic State militants in Iraq and the Levant (ISIL) as the likely perpetrator of a chemical weapons attack in Marea, Syria, on Sept. 1, 2015. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 18:17:52 GMT BPGVXRQKYVNWBFZKEZM3QOETQY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/chemical-weapons-watchdog-blames-islamic-state-2015-syria-attack-2024-02-22/Reuters世界中东
MSF slams US on Gaza at UN, says children as young as 5 want to dieThe head of Médecins Sans Frontières (Doctors Without Borders) told the United Nations Security Council on Thursday that medical teams in the Gaza Strip have come up with a new acronym: WCNSF - wounded child, no surviving family. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 17:53:29 GMT 6M6TBLYJLVM6LDJXJW4MCEMFKI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/msf-slams-us-gaza-un-says-children-young-5-want-die-2024-02-22/Michelle Nichols世界中东
IMF sees progress in Egypt talks, loan program to ease Gaza pressuresTalks with Egypt to boost its IMF loan program are making excellent progress and the country needs a comprehensive support package to deal with pressures posed by refugees from the war in Gaza, the International Monetary Fund said on Thursday. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 17:20:57 GMT CCYGRVYFVVPPLGVYPE2HSSS2DY https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/imf-says-making-excellent-progress-talks-with-egypt-2024-02-22/Andrea Shalal, David Lawder世界非洲
Europol dismantles big migrant smuggling network in Europe, arrests 19One of the biggest migrant smuggling networks across the English channel was dismantled with the arrest of 19 people in Germany, including the leader and four main organisers, Europol said on Thursday following a large-scale operation conducted with German, French and Belgian police. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 17:02:15 GMT 3NSXYU2UH5MU7DJZVKUBU2FPE4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/europol-dismantles-big-migrant-smuggling-network-europe-arrests-19-2024-02-22/Reuters世界欧洲
